div1.p:
William Loggins
was Indicted of High-Treason, for
Clipping Filing and Defacing the Currant Coin of England ; The Prisoner being searcht, in his Pocket was found a little Box of Clippings and in his House was found a parcel of Copper pieces, such as at in the middle of Farthings, and a File or two; The Prisoner said his Child found the Box of Clippings in Lester-Fields, and brough it to him, and said he had a Lodger in his House, who used the Files, and he called a Witness or two, who said that they saw the Girl take up a Box in Lester-Fields, but they did not know her The Girl said the same, how that she found it, but not upon Oath being under Age; there was no colour of Suspicion against the Prisoner, he was
Acquitted .
